DOC.brief_title: A Study Measure Effect Tolterodine Extended Release Thickness Bladder Wall Patients With Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Symptoms overactive bladder ( describe urinary urgency , without urge incontinence , usually frequency nocturia 6 month Bladder wall thickness 5mm Treatment previous four week anticholinergic drug drug treatment overactive bladder . Significant stress incontinence Urinary tract infection history intermittent urinary tract infection ( four episode last two year ) .
